Body: I am trying to unlock a Samsung Galaxy S5 which I locked with the Android Device Manager. I entered the password, which it said was incorrect. I then changed the password and the lock screen, and the lock screen on the phone did change, but when I entered the new password, it said it was wrong again even though I am positive it was entered correctly. I only have 10 tries left. Has this happened to anyone else? What do I do??
Title: android device manager not letting me unlock
